name: Block Ocean Puzzle 1010
description:
Block ocean is a block puzzle match game that takes place in the ocean. You can enjoy this block puzzle game along with fishes and bright background music being played on. The ocean mood will give you a fresh feeling while you are playing the game!

This block puzzle game is simple and very addictive that you can spend the free time with a joy. It also stimulates your brain! To get the best score in block puzzle game, your brain needs to work a lot!
To get a point, you need to blast blocks by matching the line vertically or horizontally. There are also special items that help you solve the block puzzle. Try out special abilities and find out which one would be the most helpful to blast the block puzzle.
You can play with your friends competing who would get the highest score. Let’s see who can get the highest score.

[How to play Block ocean puzzle]

• Move blocks to match the lines vertically or horizontally!
• You will fail when you can’t solve the block puzzle to make room for given blocks!
• You can use special items to solve the block puzzle. It will help you a lot to avoid failure!
• Check out the leaderboard to check your rank!
• Solving the block puzzle as many as you can to get high score!


[Game Features]
•Play game without entrance restrictions, you don't need data!
- Play Offline Without Data (Internet) Connections!
- Don't worry about Wi-Fi!

•Low-Memory
- It's a low-memory block puzzle game, so you can download it without any worry.

•Flashy graphics and simple manipulation
- It's an easy block puzzle game to play if you can match blocks to fill the square.

• This game is easy to learn, but not easy to master!


[Notice:]
- It's a free app, but it includes in-game currency, items, and paid products such as removing advertisements.

- Front, banner, and visual advertising.
